channel.title: Gaia online
channel.description: ok this should be easy. i'm just too lazy to learn how to script it myself. anyway what i want is a script that keeps swithing forums on gaia online because you get gold that way. maybe making it able to detect gift boxes would be helpful too.

item.description:

to be honest i’ve never gotten a pink link or at least i’ve never noticed[br][size=1]Posted at: April 27, 2006, 07:53:34 pm[/size][hr]nobody wants to help me? i’m pretty sure it would be easy.

item.description:

Whats funny is I thought of this even though I dont use Gaia Online anymore
